metadata.synopsis: A repeated sequential AD for the manip Nestor, where he talks to himself after it was revealed that there were explosives inside donated toys. He stays near the chest (or in the place where it was, if the player blew it up). Note: toys may be taken from the crate or the crate itself could be exploded, so we should not refer to them rather than vaguely.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A, Refugee Camp, Big BarnTrigger the toys inside the barn, proceed through Nestor's crime dialog (don't get into a prison!)

0.speaker: Manip Nestor
0.text: Toys, trapped to injure children - it's abominable!

1.speaker: Manip Nestor
1.text: Who would do such a thing?

2.speaker: Manip Nestor
2.text: I thought this assignment was going to be dull. No such luck.
